title: Best Nidalee Skin?
body: Was interested what you guys think is the best nidalee skin currently available {{champion:76}}

replies.body: I'd say Headhunter, then Pharaoh. I kinda like the look of Pharaoh better, but Headhunter feels better when playing (maybe the animations?).
Wot? Snow Bunny fo life!
Well if you only play Nid I will have to defer to your expertise.

Head-hunter is cleaner though, will admit that. It´s just I wanted snow bunny nid for SOOOOOO LOOONNNGGG (stupidly did not buy first snowdown), and I waited forever to have it. I, however, personally do not like Pharaoh. I´d rank it in terms of skin quality, Head-hunter, Witch Nid, French Maid, and Snow and Pharaoh tied for last.
Am I the only one who thinks her French Maid skin is tits?  Pun totally intended, I'll see myself out now.
I'd probably use the skin more if it had a decent splash art to represent its updated look. The splash art looks nothing like the in-game model.
Headhunter's my favourite.

> [{quoted}](name=Orbitalightning,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=MLAqQWEn,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2014-12-29T15:33:56.386+0000)
>
> {{champion:76}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 
> 
> What about the Leopard skin?

IT says "currently available"

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=MLAqQWEn,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2014-12-30T18:35:04.582+0000)
>
> IT says "currently available"

I don't typically play Nid, but I've used her a few times, and one of my mystery gifts was Leopard Nidalee. It's alright, splash art's a little outdated, though. I have Headhunter and was going to use it today in ARAM until someone dodged, and I got all excited I finally got to use it.

French Maid is, and I'm gonna get downvoted for this, kinda ugly. I mean, it's not even close to the quality of Nurse Akali in terms of splash art, in-game look aside. What's with her eyes? They look...startlingly abnormal.
I agree. I think French maid is bad :/

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=MLAqQWEn,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2014-12-30T18:35:04.582+0000)
>
> IT says "currently available"

I already have a her skins, and katarina's :P
But they aren't currently available so :P
Gotta love the double helix and sounds on Headhunter transform.  Also, just look at that cougar form!  Almost expect her to say "Strike Laser Claw!"
Snow Bunny, Leopard, and Bewitching are only available annually. But of them all I like Pharaoh best and Headhunter the least.
Bare skin, best skin.
Headhunter always
I sort of main Nidalee and I actually really like her base, which is why I don't have a skin for her lol. If I had to buy one I'd probably get Leopard, but that's because it's close to her base, lol.
Bewitching is easily the best one, but if you didn't pick it up during the Halloween event, the next best one is Headhunter imo.
So true.
Headhunter is sexy! Really goes well with her character xD
French Maid, cmon
Headhunter I think is really well made! But I do the artwork for snow bunny!
Pharaoh is such an underestimated skin, but it has such an awesome in game look, it's just the splash that made others turn away from it. Nid looks sexy with short hair ;)
